lastSession.summary: Rebalanced /ui command to give equal weight to visual consistency and component quality alongside accessibility.

shipped.summary: Rebalance /ui audit toward visual/component quality, reduce accessibility dominance
Auto-install terminal-notifier on macOS via Homebrew during install
Add desktop notifications on task completion, merge hooks repo into unified installer
Slim all commands ~55% to reduce context usage, trust Claude's intelligence
/think: recommend optimal approach, track large tasks in state.json for session continuity
Make /analyze a constructive architecture advisor (unification, abstraction, module health)
Remove mcp-guide command to reduce context overhead
Add lockfile sync validation to /push and /fix commands
Rename /mcp to /mcp-guide to avoid builtin conflict
Add context-aware statusline with visual progress bar for context usage
